verses.verse: And it came to pass in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, in the sixth <S%H8345><s%> month <S%H2568><s%>, in the fifth day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, as I sat <S%H3427><s%> in my house <S%H1004><s%>, and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H3027><s%>, that the hand of the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%> fell there upon me <S%H5307><s%>.

Then I looked <S%H7200><s%>, and behold a likeness <S%H1823><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>: from the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of his body <S%H4975><s%> even downward <S%H4295><s%>, fire <S%H784><s%>; and from his body <S%H4975><s%> even upward <S%H4605><s%>, as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of brightness <S%H2096><s%>, as the color <S%H5869><s%> of amber <S%H2830><s%>.

And he put forth <S%H7971><s%> the form <S%H8403><s%> of a hand <S%H3027><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> me by a lock <S%H6734><s%> of my head <S%H7218><s%>; and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted me up <S%H5375><s%> between the earth <S%H776><s%> and the heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> me in the visions <S%H4759><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the inner <S%H6442><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> that looks <S%H6437><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>; where was the seat <S%H4186><s%> of the image <S%H5566><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%>, which provokes to jealousy <S%H7069><s%>.
And <S%H3519><s%>, behold, the glory of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was there <S%H4758><s%>, according to the vision that I saw <S%H7200><s%> in the plain <S%H1237><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, lift up <S%H5375><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> now the way <S%H1870><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>. So I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>, and behold northward <S%H6828><s%> at the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> this image <S%H5566><s%> of jealousy <S%H7068><s%> in the entry <S%H872><s%>.

He said <S%H559><s%> furthermore unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, see <S%H7200><s%> what they do <S%H6213><s%>? even the great <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> that the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> commits <S%H6213><s%> here <S%H7368><s%>, that I should go far off from my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>? but turn <S%H7725><s%> you yet again <S%H7200><s%>, and you shall see greater <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%>.
And he brought <S%H935><s%> me to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>; and when I looked <S%H7200><s%>, behold a <S%H259><s%> hole <S%H2356><s%> in the wall <S%H7023><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, dig <S%H2864><s%> now in the wall <S%H7023><s%>: and when I had dug <S%H2864><s%> in the wall <S%H7023><s%>, behold a <S%H259><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H935><s%>, Go in, and behold <S%H7200><s%> the wicked <S%H7451><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> that they do here <S%H6213><s%>.

So I went in <S%H935><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%>; and behold every form <S%H8403><s%> of creeping things <S%H7431><s%>, and abominable <S%H8263><s%> animals <S%H929><s%>, and all the idols <S%H1544><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, portrayed <S%H2707><s%> upon the wall <S%H7023><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>.

And there stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them seventy <S%H7657><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of the ancients <S%H2205><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of them stood <S%H5975><s%> Jaazaniah <S%H2970><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shaphan <S%H8227><s%>, with every man <S%H376><s%> his censer <S%H4730><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>; and a thick <S%H6282><s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, have you seen <S%H7200><s%> what the ancients <S%H2205><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> in the dark <S%H2822><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> in the chambers <S%H2315><s%> of his imagery <S%H4906><s%>? for they say <S%H559><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> sees <S%H7200><s%> us not <S%H3068><s%>; the Lord has forsaken <S%H5800><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.
He said <S%H559><s%> also unto me <S%H7725><s%>, Turn you yet again <S%H7200><s%>, and you shall see greater <S%H1419><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> that they do <S%H6213><s%>.

Then he brought <S%H935><s%> me to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> which was toward the north <S%H6828><s%>; and <S%H3427><s%>, behold, there sat women <S%H802><s%> weeping <S%H1058><s%> for Tammuz <S%H8542><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H7200><s%>, Have you seen this <S%H1121><s%>, O son of man <S%H120><s%>? turn <S%H7725><s%> you yet again <S%H7200><s%>, and you shall see greater <S%H1419><s%> abominations than these <S%H8441><s%>.

And he brought <S%H935><s%> me into the inner <S%H6442><s%> court <S%H2691><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, and <S%H6607><s%>, behold, at the door of the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, between the porch <S%H197><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, were about five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> men <S%H376><s%>, with their backs <S%H268><s%> toward the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and their faces <S%H6440><s%> toward the east <S%H6924><s%>; and they worshiped <S%H7812><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> toward the east <S%H6924><s%>.

Then he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H7200><s%>, Have you seen this <S%H1121><s%>, O son of man <S%H120><s%>? Is it a light thing <S%H7043><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> that they commit <S%H6213><s%> the abominations <S%H8441><s%> which they commit <S%H6213><s%> here <S%H4390><s%>? for they have filled the land <S%H776><s%> with violence <S%H2555><s%>, and have returned <S%H7725><s%> to provoke me to anger <S%H3707><s%>: and <S%H7971><s%>, behold, they put the branch <S%H2156><s%> to their nose <S%H639><s%>.

Therefore will I also deal <S%H6213><s%> in fury <S%H2534><s%>: my eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare <S%H2347><s%>, neither will I have pity <S%H2550><s%>: and though they cry <S%H7121><s%> in my ears <S%H241><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, yet will I not hear them <S%H8085><s%>.
